(26488, 29260).label: variable
(26488, 29260).description: Quantities used to describe and study the climate, such as temperature, precipitation, and humidity

(26488, 29260).name: daily temporal resolution
(26488, 29260).label: variable
(26488, 29260).description: A time scale used to measure and analyze climate data, with a resolution of one day

(26488, 29260).name: 30-year normal periods
(26488, 29260).label: variable
(26488, 29260).description: A time scale used to study and analyze climate data, with a resolution of 30 years

(26488, 29260).name: temperature gradients
(26488, 29260).label: variable
(26488, 29260).description: A gradual change in temperature over a distance, affecting species communities and ecosystems

(26488, 29260).name: orographic precipitation
(26488, 29260).label: weather event
(26488, 29260).description: Precipitation that occurs when air is forced to rise over a mountain or hill, resulting in cooling and condensation

(26488, 29260).name: ClimateEU
(26488, 29260).label: project
(26488, 29260).description: A software package and dataset used to study and analyze climate data, with a focus on high-resolution spatial data

(29200, 29260).name: institutional affiliations
(29200, 29260).label: provider
(29200, 29260).description: Organizations or entities that individuals or researchers are associated with, often providing funding, resources, or support
